committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands

official_title: To establish the Fox-Wisconsin Heritage Parkway National Heritage Area, and for other purposes.
short_title: Fox-Wisconsin Heritage Parkway National Heritage Area Act of 2012

summary.text: Fox-Wisconsin Heritage Parkway National Heritage Area Act of 2012 - Establishes the Fox-Wisconsin Heritage Parkway National Heritage Area in Wisconsin. Designates the Fox-Wisconsin Heritage Parkway as the local coordinating entity for the Heritage Area. Requires the Fox-Wisconsin Heritage Parkway to prepare and submit a management plan for the Heritage Area. Sets forth requirements for the approval or disapproval of the management plan.

titles.title: Fox-Wisconsin Heritage Parkway National Heritage Area Act of 2012
To establish the Fox-Wisconsin Heritage Parkway National Heritage Area, and for other purposes.
